column4: For so long I can't remember
column5: Pretty girls and late night bars seem to be my line of work
column6: Believe me when I say,, I can't stay this high forever
column7: This man has had all he can stand,, time to lay this body down
column11: Can I stay with you a while
column12: Cause this roads been putting miles on my heart
column13: Sweetheart I've been living in a fantasy
column14: But one day,, lightning will strike
column15: And my bark will lose its bite
column16: But don't give up on me
column21: I know I promised you life
column22: But with an empty bed and the words I said don't carry any weight
column23: If I could take back yesterday,, find a way to start it over
column24: Turn around,, put that bottle down and I pray it's not too late
column28: Can I stay with you a while
column29: Cause this roads been putting miles on my heart
column30: Sweetheart I've been living in a fantasy
column31: But one day,, lightning will strike
column32: And my bark will lose its bite
column33: But don't give up on me
column40: These hands are made to hold you
column43: Come a little closer so I can show you
column44: My heart still beats fast for you
